meta.title: SaudeMAX About Page Complete Design Export

hero.heroSubtitle: Com o SaúdeMax, nossa missão é garantir acesso a cuidados de saúde que abrangem prevenção e tratamento para brasileiros nos EUA.

mission.missionSubtitle: Garantir acesso a cuidados de saúde que abrangem prevenção e tratamento para brasileiros nos EUA, oferecendo soluções personalizadas e atendimento em português.
mission.missionItem1Description: Atendimento focado nas necessidades específicas da comunidade brasileira
mission.missionItem2Description: Cobertura abrangente em todos os estados americanos
mission.missionItem3Description: Segurança e tranquilidade para você e sua família

services.servicesSubtitle: Serviços completos de saúde pensados especialmente para brasileiros vivendo nos Estados Unidos
services.service1Title: Telemedicina com médicos que falam português
services.service1Description: Consultas médicas online com profissionais brasileiros qualificados
services.service2Title: Plano de saúde voltado para imigrantes brasileiros
services.service2Description: Cobertura especializada para a comunidade brasileira nos EUA
services.service3Description: Economia significativa em serviços médicos essenciais
services.service4Description: Proteção completa para situações de emergência médica
services.service5Description: Suporte completo durante toda a jornada da maternidade
services.service6Description: Acesso a procedimentos médicos necessários com aprovação prévia

testimonials.testimonialsSubtitle: Depoimentos reais de brasileiros que confiam no SaudeMax
testimonials.testimonial1Text: O SaudeMax mudou minha vida nos EUA. Finalmente tenho acesso a cuidados de saúde de qualidade com médicos que falam português.
testimonials.testimonial2Text: Excelente atendimento e preços justos. A telemedicina é muito conveniente para nossa família.
testimonials.testimonial3Text: Recomendo para todos os brasileiros. O suporte é excepcional e os médicos são muito atenciosos.

callout.calloutTitle: Health coverage, affordability and peace of mind

whyChooseUs.benefit4: Cobertura em todos os estados americanos
whyChooseUs.ctaCardDescription: Junte-se a milhares de brasileiros que já confiam no SaudeMax para seus cuidados de saúde nos EUA.

accessibility.keyboardNavigation: All interactive elements are keyboard accessible
accessibility.screenReader: All content is screen reader friendly with proper semantic markup
accessibility.colorContrast: All text meets WCAG AA contrast ratios
accessibility.focusManagement: Proper focus management for interactive elements

optimization: Lazy load images and heavy content
Optimize animation performance with transform properties
Minimize bundle size with tree shaking

seo.title: About SaudeMax - Healthcare for Brazilians in the USA
seo.description: Learn about SaudeMax's mission to provide quality healthcare coverage for the Brazilian community in the United States
seo.keywords: healthcare, brazilians, USA, telemedicine, health insurance, medical coverage

setup: 1. Install dependencies: npm install react framer-motion lucide-react tailwindcss
2. Configure Tailwind CSS with provided color scheme
3. Create AboutPage component using the structure
4. Replace all {{placeholder}} values with actual content
5. Implement phone and email click handlers
files: tailwind.config.js - Tailwind configuration with color scheme
types.ts - TypeScript interfaces for testimonials and services

cms.testimonials: Store in database/CMS for easy management
cms.services: Dynamic service list from content management

googleAnalytics.events: Page views, button clicks, form submissions

emailProvider.templates: Use for quote requests and contact forms

testCases: Hero section displays correctly on all screen sizes
Mission cards have proper hover effects
Service cards display icons and text correctly
Phone and email links work correctly
Page is responsive on mobile, tablet, and desktop
All animations play smoothly without lag
Accessibility: Can navigate entire page with keyboard
Performance: Page loads in under 3 seconds
SEO: Meta tags and structured data are correct

assets.images: Optimize all images for web (WebP format preferred)
assets.fonts: Preload critical fonts to prevent layout shifts
assets.icons: Use SVG icons for crisp display at all sizes

hosting.cdn: Use CDN for global content delivery

monitoring.analytics: Track page performance and user interactions

migrationNotes.fromSaudeMAX: This export contains the complete AboutPage component design from the SaudeMAX healthcare platform
migrationNotes.usage: Use this JSON to recreate the exact same about page experience in any React project
migrationNotes.customization: Replace all {{placeholder}} values with your specific business information
migrationNotes.extensions: Add additional services, testimonials, team members, company history, etc.
migrationNotes.branding: Update colors, fonts, and imagery to match your brand
migrationNotes.localization: Adapt Portuguese content for your target market

bundleOptimization.codesplitting: Lazy load heavy components if needed
bundleOptimization.minification: Minify CSS and JavaScript in production

maintenance.updating: Easy to update content by changing placeholder values
maintenance.extending: Add new sections by following existing patterns
maintenance.styling: Consistent design system makes changes predictable
